file_content.text: Commander, we are so honored to meet you. We volunteered for this assignment because we were told you would oversee it personally.
See the shield generator with your own eyes. We must record our notes of this first meeting while the memories are fresh.
We are so cold on this world. The only upside is we can see the heat images of others perfectly.
You return alive and victorious. We are greatly pleased to see you again. We were told of your mighty battle at the shield generator.
Abundant success, Commander! You have proven yourself as the greatest war leader on Hoth.
The time to strike has come. We will join you inside the shield generator bunker.
Eat our bolts, Zakuul scum! Also, tell us your names for posterity!
We did not expect to arrive before you, Commander! But it is good, because now we will witness your every achievement in this battle.
That was exhilarating, Commander. We now feel less self-conscious about revealing that was our first combat mission.
The Star Fortress of Hoth is destroyed! This is good... and bad.
The Alliance insurgency on Hoth stands ready to aid your assault on the Star Fortress, Commander.
We are always pleased to see you, Commander. What do you bring?
[Turn in Alien Research crate.]
An excellent find.
[Report the Hoth Resistance Campaign is complete to receive a massive Influence gain.]
Your success bolsters the insurgents! Many who questioned joining you now see the benefit.
We are still not prepared for a successful assault. More supplies, please.
I'll find the rest of what we need.
Safe travels, Commander. We will be here.
[Start the Hoth Resistance Campaign. Completion will grant a massive Influence gain.]
We believe if you can definitively settle certain longstanding conflicts on Hoth, those involved may come to see you as their leader.
[Start a Heroic Mission to secure supply crates.]
We have discovered an opportunity for a battle worthy of history that could also achieve our materiel needs.
[Start an Eternal Empire Champion Duel.]
For the first time, the Star Fortress has dispatched forces to Hoth's surface. We must conceal your insurgency.
We will soon have enough supplies to mount a successful insurgency. Remain steadfast, Commander.
Good, because the enemy's threat to the Alliance and those who would join is ended. Bad, because Hoth has a new debris field to fight over.
But there is also spectacular news! Theron Shan has approved our transfer request. We and our blasters will be ready whenever you need us.
We have requested a transfer to serve as your combat adjutant once the mission is complete.
We will monitor your battles from here and record your exploits with breathless anticipation. For history!
I couldn't tell. You really are a natural with those blasters.
You flatter us. We still think we are more skilled at composing historical chronicles.
You're lucky to be alive. What were you thinking, following me here?
We were thinking we would die. But it would be worth it. Our chronicle would live on and inform future generations of your grandeur.
Now we hit that Star Fortress with everything we have.
Theron Shan has requested our assistance planning the final assault on the enemy battle station. We will fly to Odessen and see you at your camp.
It has been our greatest honor to fight by your side. We hope to do it again after the Star Fortress is destroyed.
Holorecorder activated, blasters charged, bladder empty. Let us do this!
We will deliver these final supplies and signal the attack on the Star Fortress shield generator.
We will find you inside the facility. It will be our tremendous honor to fight at your side.
Also, your efforts will expand the scope of our chronicles on your behalf. Truly, a victory for all.
Find the enemy and ensure it does not report back. Also, take its things. They may prove useful.
You were observed by potential allies. They were favorably impressed, and are now prepared to forswear their old loyalties and join you.
Tell me about these potential allies. Who are they? What factions are they from?
Republic, Sith Empire, White Maw, Chiss Ascendancy, Ortolan settlers. All see the Star Fortress threat. All have reason to join you.
Did you send me out on some kind of test?
We would never presume to test you, Commander! However, a demonstration of your prowess turned more heads than our words of praise ever could.
I don't want traitors in my Alliance. What's to stop them from "forswearing" me?
We believe you command equal parts of their respect and fear. We cannot imagine anyone else who could supplant you.
History teaches that all successful insurgencies require two elements: dedicated loyalists, and abundant implements of warfare. We can provide the former if you provide the latter.
Hoth is home to many camps. Some friendly, many not. But all are sources of the supplies your fledgling insurgency will need.
Find supplies and bring them to us. When we have enough, our forces can lend their aid to destroy the shield generator.
I appreciate your enthusiasm, but this is a dangerous world. You're risking your life coming here.
All life is risk. We observe this truth throughout history.
Who are you? One of Hoth's stranded pirates?
By the stars, no! We are a respected military historian.
Oh, good--just what I needed. Another fan.
We are much more than your fan. We are your biographer.
We are the individual named Hemdil Tre. Before the war, we were the official chronicler of military antiquity for the Grand Nest of Cona.
We are well-studied in all matters of warfare. We are also what the combat instructor called "a freak of nature" when firing blasters.
We leaped at the chance to lend our fields of expertise to you and your Alliance. We hope to compose the definitive chronicle of your struggle against the Eternal Empire.
I look forward to seeing you in action. Bring me up to speed on the situation.
A two-gun historian. That's... unusual.
We are versatile, but we are no Commander, like you.
My version of the truth is the only thing you should write down. Understood?
History conforms to the victorious. Every chronicler knows this truth.
We have taken a full accounting of the situation on Hoth. Things are much the same as they were before the Star Fortress arrived.
Republic and Sith Empire still fight the White Maw and other pirate bands for control of Hoth's starship graveyard. But now, Zakuul watches from above.
The enemy does not interfere. Instead, it adds fuel to the fire by sending new starship wrecks to Hoth's surface.
The Star Fortress broadcasts a false Alliance signal, drawing those who would join our cause. When the vessels arrive, the enemy shoots them down.
We have to send out a counter-signal and warn people about this trap!
Theron Shan is working on this, but the enemy's control over hyperwave communications is near-total.
How many potential allies has the Star Fortress shot down?
We estimate at least three dozen warships of various classifications. The smallest was a scout vessel. The largest was a light cruiser.
A clever snare. I'll have to use it myself, someday.
We have studied numerous examples of adopting enemy tactics with great success. The key appears to be replicating the intent, not the exact process.
We have located the enemy's shield generator facility, but were unable to approach. It is heavily guarded. We recommend you see for yourself, Commander.
We will continue our negotiations with those here who might aid the Alliance. We hope to have good news upon your return.
But there is also spectacular news! Theron Shan has approved our transfer request. We and our blasters will be ready whenever you need us.
[Start the Hoth Resistance Campaign. Completion will grant a massive Influence gain.]
[Turn in Ancient Artifact crate.]
[Turn in Military Equipment crate.]
[Turn in Smuggled Goods crate.]
[Turn in supply crates.]
[Do Nothing.]
[Go Back.]
Commander. Your heat pattern shines beyond all others.
We stand by your side to educate and assist.
Your accounts continue to swell, Commander. We are honored to chronicle your heroism.
We are happy to share reports on military stratagems at your leisure.
"Victory" shall be the epilogue of this Alliance.
As our numbers grow, we find difficulty in discerning individuals. This is good.
All roads have two paths: One to victory, one to defeat. You are our feet, Commander. Guide us well.
A single holobook will not suffice in telling your tale.
